question.q: What is the veterinarian’s preferred feline parasite solution?
<55>REVOLUTION® has a broad spectrum of indications to treat and prevent external and internal parasites including:</55>
What product demonstrated 99% efficacy against adult fleas on Day 30, 48 hours after challenge in a feline study by Dr. Michael Dryden, et al*?
question.references: <30>*Dryden MW, Smith V, Payne PA, McTier TL. Comparative speed of kill of selamectin, imidacloprid, and fipronil-(s)-methoprene spot-on formulations against fleas on cats. Vet Ther. 2005;6(3):228-236.</30>

question.q:
<58>In a study by Dr. Clarke Atkins, et al* what % of cats diagnosed with heartworm infection were considered
to be solely indoor cats by their owner?</58>
question.references: <30>*Atkins CE, DeFrancesco TC, Coats JR, Sidley JA, Keene BW. Heartworm infection in cats: 50 cases (1985-1997). J Am Vet Med Assoc. 2000;217(3):355-385.</30>

question.q: What parasites are well-known causes of the zoonotic disease larval migrans syndrome in humans?
What % of pet owners would prefer an all-in-one parasite medication?
